revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Hokulani Observatory |image = [[File:Hokulani Observatory.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Hokulani Observatory. |tokens = 1,000,000 |location = Northeast of Mt. Hokulani. }}
'''Hokulani Observatory''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 121 tiles arranged in a 11x11 square, The [[Gyms#Alola|Electrium-Z]] [[File:ElectriumZ.png|30px]] is awarded upon clearing this dungeon, including 11 chest tiles, 41 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 13,883,676 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
